block.p: Romina Field, the daughter of Carl and Pearl Field of Briarwood, Queens, was married yesterday to Oded Weiss, a son of Dina Weiss of Ramat Hasharon, Israel, and the late Yigal Weiss. Rabbi Moshe Turk performed the ceremony at the Pierre in New York.

The bride, 25, is an associate at Roberts & Holland, a New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from Columbia University, where she was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. She received a law degree from Harvard University.

Romina Field, the daughter of Carl and Pearl Field of Briarwood, Queens, was married yesterday to Oded Weiss, a son of Dina Weiss of Ramat Hasharon, Israel, and the late Yigal Weiss. Rabbi Moshe Turk performed the ceremony at the Pierre in New York.

The bride, 25, is an associate at Roberts & Holland, a New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from Columbia University, where she was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. She received a law degree from Harvard University.
Mr. Oded, 28, is an accountant at Deloitte & Touche, the accounting firm in New York. He graduated from Queens College.
